FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for an OSPF process.
The undo description command deletes the configured description. The description command configures a description for an OSPF process. The undo description command deletes the configured description. By default, no description is configured for an OSPF process.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a description for an OSPF process.
The description text is a string of 1 to 80 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo: The description of an OSPF process helps identify special processes, facilitating network maintenance.
